Cleanse back.sentence: The nurse gathers antiseptic solution and sterile gauze for cleansing the back.
Cleanse back.subject: The nurse

Cleanse back.sentence: The nurse positions the patient comfortably to access the back area.
Cleanse back.subject: The nurse

Cleanse back.sentence: The nurse applies antiseptic solution to the sterile gauze to prepare for cleansing.
Cleanse back.subject: The nurse
Cleanse back.object: antiseptic solution to the sterile gauze

Cleanse back.sentence: The nurse gently cleanses the back using the prepared gauze in circular motions.
Cleanse back.subject: The nurse

Cleanse back.sentence: The nurse disposes of the used gauze and ensures the back is dry after cleansing.
Cleanse back.subject: The nurse
Cleanse back.object: the used gauze and ensures the back is dry
